titles: Cupid and death a private entertainment, represented with scenes & musick, vocall & instrumentall. Writen by J.S.
author: Shirley, James, 1596-1666.
publisher: printed for John Crooke and John Playford, and are to be sold at their shops in St. Paul's Church yard and in the Inner Temple,
notes: Variant: title page partly in a different setting (possibly a cancel), with "scenes, variety of dancing, and musick, both vocall & instrumentall" in the title.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
